SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Expanded Disability Rating Scale - Postacute Interview Survivor Version - Can you dress and groom yourself independently and appropriately or direct someone else in these activities without help or reminders?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: Expanded DRS-PI Survivor Version - Can Dress and Groom Self Independently

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Expanded Disability Rating Scale - Postacute Interview Survivor Version - Are you able to give the correct date and time within a few seconds of being asked?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: Expanded DRS-PI Survivor Version - Give Correct Date and Time When Asked

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Expanded Disability Rating Scale - Postacute Interview Survivor Version - Can you feed yourself independently or manage tube feedings appropriately without help or reminders?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: Expanded DRS-PI Survivor Version - Feed Yourself Independently Without Help

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Expanded Disability Rating Scale - Postacute Interview Survivor Version - Do you function completely independently? That is, you do not require any physical assistance, supervision, equipment, devices, or reminders for cognitive, social, behavioral, emotional, and physical function?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: Expanded DRS-PI Survivor Version - Function Completely Independently

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Expanded Disability Rating Scale - Postacute Interview Survivor Version - Can you function with complete independence in work or social situations?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: Expanded DRS-PI Survivor Version - Function With Independent Work or Social Situations

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Expanded Disability Rating Scale - Postacute Interview Survivor Version - Can you keep track of time, schedules and appointments?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: Expanded DRS-PI Survivor Version - Keep Track of Time

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Expanded Disability Rating Scale - Postacute Interview Survivor Version - Do you know how to bathe and wash?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: Expanded DRS-PI Survivor Version - Know How to Bathe and Wash

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Expanded Disability Rating Scale - Postacute Interview Survivor Version - Do you know when meal or feeding times are?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: Expanded DRS-PI Survivor Version - Know Meal Times

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Expanded Disability Rating Scale - Postacute Interview Survivor Version - Do you know when to use the toilet or to conduct bowel and bladder management?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: Expanded DRS-PI Survivor Version - Know When to Use Toilet

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Expanded Disability Rating Scale - Postacute Interview Survivor Version - Do you understand how to manage your clothing or special equipment when toileting or in bowel and bladder management?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: Expanded DRS-PI Survivor Version - Manage Clothing When Toileting

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Expanded Disability Rating Scale - Postacute Interview Survivor Version - Do you need 24-hour care and are not able to help with your own care at all?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: Expanded DRS-PI Survivor Version - Need 24-Hour Care

SKOS_CONCEPT.alt_label: ED2-Need a Helper Always Close By
SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Expanded Disability Rating Scale - Postacute Interview Survivor Version - Do you take care of some of your needs but also need a helper who is always close by?
SKOS_CONCEPT.notation: ED2-Need a Helper Always Close By
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: Expanded DRS-PI Survivor Version - Need a Helper Always Close By

SKOS_CONCEPT.alt_label: ED2-Need Help With All Major Activities
SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Expanded Disability Rating Scale - Postacute Interview Survivor Version - Do you need help with all major activities and the assistance of another person all the time?
SKOS_CONCEPT.notation: ED2-Need Help With All Major Activities
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: Expanded DRS-PI Survivor Version - Need Help With All Major Activities

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Expanded Disability Rating Scale - Postacute Interview Survivor Version - How certain are you that you can perform in a wide variety of jobs of your choosing or manage a home independently or participate in school full-time?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: Expanded DRS-PI Survivor Version - Perform Jobs or Manage a Home Independently

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Expanded Disability Rating Scale - Postacute Interview Survivor Version - Do you require assistance from another person to manage emotions and behavior?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: Expanded DRS-PI Survivor Version - Require Assistance Managing Emotions

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Expanded Disability Rating Scale - Postacute Interview Survivor Version - Do you require assistance from another person in tasks that require thinking abilities?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: Expanded DRS-PI Survivor Version - Require Assistance Thinking Tasks

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Expanded Disability Rating Scale - Postacute Interview Survivor Version - Do you require physical assistance from another person to meet daily needs?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: Expanded DRS-PI Survivor Version - Require Physical Assistance

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Expanded Disability Rating Scale - Postacute Interview Survivor Version - Do you REQUIRE special aids or equipment, such as, a brace, walker, wheelchair, memory notebook, day planner, verbal reminders, prompts, cues, or alarm watch because of a disability?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: Expanded DRS-PI Survivor Version - Require Special Aids or Equipment

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Expanded Disability Rating Scale - Postacute Interview Survivor Version - Can you start and finish these grooming activities without prompting?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: Expanded DRS-PI Survivor Version - Start and Finish Grooming Activities

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Expanded Disability Rating Scale - Postacute Interview Survivor Version - How certain are you that you can be successful at work, school or in home management with some reduction in the work load or with other accommodations due to disabilities?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: Expanded DRS-PI Survivor Version - Successful With Accommodations

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Expanded Disability Rating Scale - Postacute Interview Survivor Version - How certain are you that you can be successful at work, school or in home management but with limited choices in jobs or school courses due to disabilities?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: Expanded DRS-PI Survivor Version - Successful With Limited Choices

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Expanded Disability Rating Scale - Postacute Interview Survivor Version - Do you understand what eating or feeding utensils or equipment are for and how they should be used?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: Expanded DRS-PI Survivor Version - Understand Feeding Utensils

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Expanded Disability Rating Scale - Postacute Interview Survivor Version - Do you understand how to get dressed?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: Expanded DRS-PI Survivor Version - Understand How to Get Dressed

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Expanded Disability Rating Scale - Postacute Interview Survivor Version - Can you understand, remember, and follow directions?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: Expanded DRS-PI Survivor Version - Understand and Follow Directions

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Expanded Disability Rating Scale - Postacute Interview Survivor Version - Can you use the toilet or manage your bowel and bladder routine independently and appropriately without help or reminders?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: Expanded DRS-PI Survivor Version - Use Toilet Independently

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Expanded Disability Rating Scale - Postacute Interview Survivor Version - How certain are you that you can be able to work at home or in a special setting like a sheltered workshop in which the work is very routine and there is very frequent supervision and support?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: Expanded DRS-PI Survivor Version - Work With Frequent Supervision and Support
